bibl.title: Parfianskii vystrel. [Parthian Shot.]
bibl.note: 24 contributions [in Russian]. - Pp. 7-13: G.M.B.-L. & Yu.L., Foreword; - 721-727: V.Yu. ZUEV & I.V. TUNKINA, Materials for the biobliography of M.I. Rostovstzeff: addenda et corrigenda; - 731-747: Index of names; - 748-759: Geographical index. - Part I. M.I.R. and his "Syrian Pompeii" [i.e. Dura-Europos]. - Part II. The "Hellenistic Worlds" of M.I.R. - Part III. M.I.R.'s Travels in North Africa, Egypt and Near East. - Part IV. M.I.R. and the Problem of Scythian and Sarmatian Archaeology. - Part V. New Additions to the Biography and Works of M.I.R.
